summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2072, for the improvement of Calhoun Street, East McGraw Street and East Lynn Street, each from 15th Avenue North to a point 180 feet east of 26th Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and constructing wooden stairways where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21203 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
